name: Flardo's Festive Quest
description:
Twas a week before Christmas. And all through the town.

The folk were festive, but also quite down.

The necromancers came and stole their Festive Tree

Now it's up to a wizard to set their spirits free

A short Flardo's Quest Christmas special!

Note: This is game is only up for a limited time (January 1st 2021)

Merry Christmas!
